Iron Man! Tony Stark, aka Iron Man, is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. He's a founding member of the Avengers and has been portrayed by Robert Downey Jr. in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movies.
Iron Man's suit is a technological marvel, with a range of advanced features, including superhuman strength, flight, and a variety of weapons. Over the years, Tony Stark has continually upgraded and refined the suit, making it an iconic symbol of innovation and technological advancement.
